p2f_HydrateCalcLib: a Library for the Prediction of Gas Hydrate Equilibrium and Inhibition
============================================================================================

Installation
#############
Get the latest version of hydrates from https://pypi.python.org/pypi/p2f_HydrateCalcLib/

If you have an installation of Python with pip, simple install it with:

$ pip install p2f_HydrateCalcLib

To get the git version, run:

$ git clone git://github.com/karstenkunneman/p2f_HydrateCalcLib.git

The latest development version of p2f_HydrateCalcLibâ€™ source can be obtained at

https://github.com/karstenkunneman/p2f_HydrateCalcLib
